explanation: The stage direction 'II ouvre le treillage, et l'on voit la Comtesse à la place de la statue' describes a change in the visual setting of the stage as it indicates what the audience sees through the trellis and specifies the transformation of the scene with the Countess appearing in place of the statue. This falls under stage description or play location.
stgdir: II ouvre le treillage, et l'on voit la Comtesse à la place de la statue.
